select.if:
select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from Product where product_category = 1
and user_seq = #{store_seq}
and name like '%'|| #{sWord} ||'%'
order by p_num asc) a )
order by stock asc) a )
order by stock desc) a )
order by p_count asc) a )
order by p_count desc) a )
where rnum >= #{pageDto.startRow} and rnum<= #{pageDto.endRow}

select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from Product where product_category = 2
and user_seq = #{store_seq}
and name like '%'|| #{sWord} ||'%'
order by p_num asc) a )
order by stock asc) a )
order by stock desc) a )
order by p_count asc) a )
order by p_count desc) a )
where rnum >= #{pageDto.startRow} and rnum<= #{pageDto.endRow}

mapper.delete: delete from wishlist where user_seq=#{user_seq} and p_num=#{p_num}
mapper.select: select p_num from wishlist where user_seq=#{user_seq}
select p_num,count from cart where user_seq=#{user_seq}
select c.*, p.* from cart c inner join product p on c.p_num = p.p_num where c.user_seq = #{user_seq}
select w.*, p.* from wishlist w inner join product p on w.p_num = p.p_num where w.user_seq = #{user_seq}
